src:
Gorica izgubila v Beltincih
02 Nov 2019, 17:43 by STA

Nogometaši Gorice so v boju za vrh lestvice 2. slovenske lige doživeli nov udarec.



Foto: STA

BELTINCI > V 16. krogu so namreč z 1:2 izgubili v Beltincih, tako da lahko vodilni Koper v nedeljo na tekmi s Krko še poveča prednost, in sicer na pet točk.
Priložnost točkovno se izenačiti z Gorico je tako imela Nafta 1903, ki pa ji je tudi spodrsnilo, saj je v gosteh igrala 0:0 z Brežicami Termami Čatež.
Na drugih tekmah je Roltek Dob doma z 1:0 premagal Fužinar, Drava je z 0:1 izgubila proti Jadranu, Koroška Dravograd in Brda pa sta se razšla z 2:2.
text:
Gorizia lost in Beltinci
02 Nov 2019, 17:43 by STA

Gorica football players have taken another blow in the fight for the top spot of the 2nd Slovenian league.



Photo: STA

BELTINS> In the 16th round, they lost 1: 2 in Beltinci, so that the leading Koper can still increase their advantage by 5 points on Sunday against Krka.
Nafta 1903 had the opportunity to equalize Gorizia with a point, which also slipped, as it played 0: 0 with Brežice Terme Čatež.
In other games, Roltek Dob defeated Fužinar at home 1-0, Drava lost 0-0 to Adriatic, Carinthia Dravograd and Brda split 2-2.
